title: "Fishing Condition"

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(plyr)
library(ggplot2)
```

```{r}
data = read.csv("./log_process/result_1.csv")
data2 = read.csv("./log_process/result_2.csv")
data3 = read.csv("./log_process/result_3.csv")

yr_mean = ddply(data, .(year), summarize,  left=mean(left), scotland=mean(scotland), temperature=mean(temperature))
yr_mean = yr_mean[yr_mean$year > 2003, ]
yr_mean_1 = ddply(data2, .(year), summarize,  left=mean(left), scotland=mean(scotland), temperature=mean(temperature))
yr_mean_1 = yr_mean_1[yr_mean_1$year > 2003, ]
yr_mean_2 = ddply(data3, .(year), summarize,  left=mean(left), scotland=mean(scotland), temperature=mean(temperature))
yr_mean_2 = yr_mean_2[yr_mean_2$year > 2003, ]
#pdf("figure/fish_yr.pdf", width=7, height=4) 
# plot(left~year, yr_mean, type="o", xlab="Year", ylab="Count", main="Total Fish in Year")
#dev.off()
ggplot(yr_mean, aes(year, left)) + 
  geom_line(linetype = "solid") +
  labs(title = "Total Fish in Year", y = "Count", x = "Year") +
  geom_point() +
  theme(plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5))
ggsave('figure/fish_total.pdf', width=7, height=4)
```

```{r}
# pdf("figure/fish_yr.pdf", width=7, height=4) 
ggplot(yr_mean, aes(year, scotland)) + 
  geom_line(linetype = "solid") +
  labs(title = "Total Fish Available around Scotland", y = "Count", x = "Year") +
  geom_point() +
  theme(plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5))
ggsave('figure/fish_available.pdf', width=7, height=4)

ggplot(yr_mean, aes(year, scotland/left)) + 
  geom_line(linetype = "solid") +
  labs(title = "Total Fish Available Ratio around Scotland", y = "Scotland / Total", x = "Year") +
  geom_point() +
  scale_y_continuous(labels = scales::percent) +
  theme(plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5))

ggsave('figure/fish_ratio.pdf', width=7, height=4)

ggplot(yr_mean, aes(year, temperature)) + 
  geom_line(linetype = "solid") +
  labs(title = "Average Temperature of Simulating Region", y = "Temperature", x = "Year") +
  geom_point() +
  theme(plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5))

ggsave('figure/fish_temp.pdf', width=7, height=4)
```

```{r}
xx = seq(100, 300, by=12)
ggplot(data[100:300,], aes(factor(id), temperature, group=1)) + 
  geom_line(linetype = "solid") +
  labs(title = "Average Temperature of Simulating Region", y = "Temperature", x = "Year") +
  geom_point() +
  scale_x_discrete(breaks = xx, labels=data$year[xx]) +
  theme(plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5))

ggsave('figure/fish_temp_month.pdf', width=12, height=7)
```
